description: Mihiriya Galla Pathiranage Gayan Indika Vs. Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Mihiriya Galla Pathiranage Gayan Indika Vs. Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Condition where Homicide can be reduced from Murder to Culpable Homicide Not Amounting to Murder – Exception 4 to Section 294 – the Sudden Fight Exception – Elements which needs to be established in order to apply the sudden fight exception; i. sudden fight, ii. absence of pre-meditation, iii. no undue advantage, iv. Offender should not act in a cruel or unusual manner – Where the exception of sudden fight is pleaded it is immaterial as to which party offers the provocation or commits the initial assault – Evidence
